title.zh: AI Agent 工程师 | 全栈开发工程师

zh: 负责 AI Agent 审核系统、10 亿级策略分析平台与反作弊治理系统的架构设计与落地
深耕 RAG/图数据库/分布式系统，独立设计 V1→V4 四版本 AI Agent 架构演进
从 0 到 1 独立完成攀岩 iOS 应用全流程：产品/UI/前后端/AI 模型/DevOps
设计 VideoMind Chain-of-Roles 工作流，成本优化 39%，准确率达 92%
构建 OpenMemory Plus 双层记忆框架，支持 4+ IDE Agent 无缝共享
en: Led architecture design of AI Agent review system, 10-billion-level strategy analysis platform and anti-fraud governance system
Deep expertise in RAG/Graph Database/Distributed Systems, independently designed V1→V4 AI Agent architecture evolution
Built climbing iOS app from 0 to 1: Product/UI/Full-stack/AI Model/DevOps
Designed VideoMind Chain-of-Roles workflow, 39% cost reduction with 92% accuracy
Built OpenMemory Plus dual-layer memory framework, supporting 4+ IDE Agents seamless sharing
